item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: finleydesign
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://eastangliaserviceing.co.uk.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymised string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service Privacy Policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognise and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

font_container="tag:h2|font_size:2em|text_align:left|color:%237a7a7a|line_height:1.2em" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_column_text]We offer modular motorhome servicing as we have found that this suits our customers.[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title="Discover More" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Feastanglianservicing.co.uk%2Fmotorhome-service%2F|title:Motorhome%20Service"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1689955236441{margin-top: 20px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="2/3" css=".vc_custom_1689955206383{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}" _et_uniqid="et_custom_uniqid_new_647df976b64ca"][vc_column_text]In addition to your annual habitation check it is now being recommended by the NCC and AWS that every 3 years your caravan and motorhome has a EICR. A EICR is in in depth report on your vehicles electrical system. Every joint, connection, socket,  cable insulation and plug is checked both electronically with high voltage and manually. This means every connections is checked and tightened as well as inspected for any possible damage or past or potential issues. Some campsites and insurance companies now are asking for this report to ensure safety among caravans and the sites. Insurance companies may even be offering discounts in some instances. Our EICR takes approximately 4 hours and costs: £240 inclusive.  If you would like to read up more please see an independent advice page on what is required, recommended or suggested and when. The AWS leaflet on this recommendation can be viewed here.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1685977397988{margin-top: 50px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;background-color: rgba(30,115,190,0.14) !important;*background-color: rgb(30,115,190) !important;border-radius: 15px !important;}" _et_uniqid="et_custom_uniqid_new_647df9323bb35"][vc_custom_heading text="Book an Appointment" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:24px|text_align:left|color:%23686868|line_height:1.2em" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_column_text]Main items include
  • Service item
  • Service item
  • Service item
  • Service item
  • Service item

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title="Book an Appointment" color="inverse" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Feastanglianservicing.co.uk%2Fbook-appointment%2F|title:Book%20Appointment"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Habitation Services
item.dc:creator: finleydesign
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" fixed_background="center_bottom" css=".vc_custom_1687948831184{margin-top: -20px !important;padding-top: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://eastanglianservicing.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/caravan2.jpg?id=79) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}" _et_uniqid="et_custom_uniqid_new_647e08954793b"][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="2/3" css=".vc_custom_1685977465927{margin-top: -80px !important;border-top-width: 10px !important;padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-color: #1e73be !important;border-top-style: solid !important;}" _et_uniqid="et_custom_uniqid_new_647df976b64ca"][vc_custom_heading source="post_title" font_container="tag:h1|font_size:40px|text_align:left|color:%231e73be|line_height:1.2em" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_column_text]A service of all the habitable areas of a caravan or motorhome. In simple terms, this is all of the areas that are sitting on the chassis of the vehicle.[/vc_column_text][vc_tta_accordion c_icon="chevron" active_section="99" no_fill="true" collapsible_all="true"][vc_tta_section title="Electrical System" tab_id="1685977496894-d76e66ed-86bb5e98-cc94"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1685979502375{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}"]
  • 12n, 12s/13 pin euro plugs & cables – check condition & test
  • Road lights & reflectors – check condition & operation
  • Battery (if fitted) – check condition of battery and compartment & check battery charge state
  • Battery (if fitted) – check & top up level if required & perform high discharge test
  • Check battery charge rate from 12s/13 pin euro plug
  • Fridge – check operation from 12s/13 pin euro plug
  • Interior lighting & equipment- check operation & fuse rating
  • Awning light – check operation
  • Wiring earths – check for defects on all ELV circuits
  • LV inlet plug & extension lead – check condition & resistance across connection points
  • Earth bonding – carry out resistance check
  • RCD unit – check operation of RCD test button & operation of MCB’s
  • 230v sockets – carry out plug top polarity test
  • Charger – check output charge rate at battery connections
  • Fridge – check operation of fridge on 230v
  • Check operation of all other 230v appliances,fans & luminaries
  • Air conditioning (if fitted) – check operation
  • Check that any additional items are to the correct standard
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Gas System" tab_id="1685977496908-e30ffef1-96595e98-cc94"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1685979530240{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}"]
  • Regulator & gas hose – check age, performance & security
  • Carry out gas leak check
  • Appliances – check operation of all gas appliances fitted including FFDs
  • Gas cylinder – check security
  • Ensure all gas dispersal vents are clear
(Please note the fridge not serviced unless requested)[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Water System" tab_id="1685977944283-4898f6ed-08735e98-cc94"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1685979543145{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}"]
  • Water pump & pressure switch – check operation
  • Taps, micro switch, valves, pipes & tank (if fitted) check condition & operation
  • Water filter & housing – check for leaks & replace filter if required
  • Waste system – check for leaks
  • Water tanks (if fitted) – check security of all water tanks, including underslung
  • Drain down – winter only (unless advised by customer not to do so)
  • Toilet – check security, operation of flush pump & lubricate seals
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Ventilation" tab_id="1685977945171-d5fca525-f30c5e98-cc94"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1685979558951{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}"]
  • Fixed ventilation – check for obstruction & free flow of air
  • Check all fixed ventilation is guarded against vermin ingression
  • Roof lights – check for cracks, operation & free of obstructions
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1685977397988{margin-top: 50px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;background-color: rgba(30,115,190,0.14) !important;*background-color: rgb(30,115,190) !important;border-radius: 15px !important;}" _et_uniqid="et_custom_uniqid_new_647df9323bb35"][vc_custom_heading text="MOTORHOME HABITATION SERVICES" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:18px|text_align:left|color:%23727272|line_height:1.2em" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_column_text]
  • Gas Leak detection
  • Gas appliances safety and operation check
  • 240v Electrical safety and operation check
  • 12v Electrical safety and operation check
  • Fire and safety devices
  • Vehicle inspection and operation survey
  • Full damp check
[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title="Book an Appointment" color="inverse" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Feastanglianservicing.co.uk%2Fbook-appointment%2F|title:Book%20Appointment"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: .vc_custom_1687948831184{margin-top: -20px !important;padding-top: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://eastanglianservicing.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/caravan2.jpg?id=79) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}.vc_custom_1685977465927{margin-top: -80px !important;border-top-width: 10px !important;padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-color: #1e73be !important;border-top-style: solid !important;}.vc_custom_1685977397988{margin-top: 50px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;background-color: rgba(30,115,190,0.14) !important;*background-color: rgb(30,115,190) !important;border-radius: 15px !important;}.vc_custom_1685979502375{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}.vc_custom_1685979530240{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}.vc_custom_1685979543145{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}.vc_custom_1685979558951{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}

item.title: Motorhome Service
item.dc:creator: finleydesign
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" fixed_background="center_bottom" css=".vc_custom_1688733883271{margin-top: -20px !important;padding-top: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://eastanglianservicing.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/family-vacation-travel-rv-holiday-trip-motorhome-caravan-car-vacation.jpg?id=8) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}" _et_uniqid="et_custom_uniqid_new_647e08954793b"][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="2/3" css=".vc_custom_1685977465927{margin-top: -80px !important;border-top-width: 10px !important;padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-color: #1e73be !important;border-top-style: solid !important;}" _et_uniqid="et_custom_uniqid_new_647df976b64ca"][vc_custom_heading source="post_title" font_container="tag:h1|font_size:40px|text_align:left|color:%231e73be|line_height:1.2em" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_column_text]A service of all the habitable areas of a caravan or motorhome. In simple terms, this is all of the areas that are sitting on the chassis of the vehicle. This should be carried out annually on the habitation area or ‘home’ element of your motorhome. It is designed to check that the gas, electric, water systems and appliances are running safely, efficiently and smoothly. In the unlikely event of damp entering your motorhome it is detected as soon as possible.[/vc_column_text][vc_tta_accordion c_icon="chevron" active_section="99" no_fill="true" collapsible_all="true"][vc_tta_section title="Electrical System" tab_id="1685977496894-d76e66ed-86bbb073-a4b3"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1685979502375{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}"]
  • 12n, 12s/13 pin euro plugs & cables – check condition & test
  • Road lights & reflectors – check condition & operation
  • Battery (if fitted) – check condition of battery and compartment & check battery charge state
  • Battery (if fitted) – check & top up level if required & perform high discharge test
  • Check battery charge rate from 12s/13 pin euro plug
  • Fridge – check operation from 12s/13 pin euro plug
  • Interior lighting & equipment- check operation & fuse rating
  • Awning light – check operation
  • Wiring earths – check for defects on all ELV circuits
  • LV inlet plug & extension lead – check condition & resistance across connection points
  • Earth bonding – carry out resistance check
  • RCD unit – check operation of RCD test button & operation of MCB’s
  • 230v sockets – carry out plug top polarity test
  • Charger – check output charge rate at battery connections
  • Fridge – check operation of fridge on 230v
  • Check operation of all other 230v appliances,fans & luminaries
  • Air conditioning (if fitted) – check operation
  • Check that any additional items are to the correct standard
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Gas System" tab_id="1685977496908-e30ffef1-9659b073-a4b3"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1685979530240{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}"]
  • Regulator & gas hose – check age, performance & security
  • Carry out gas leak check
  • Appliances – check operation of all gas appliances fitted including FFDs
  • Gas cylinder – check security
  • Ensure all gas dispersal vents are clear
(Please note the fridge not serviced unless requested)[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Water System" tab_id="1685977944283-4898f6ed-0873b073-a4b3"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1685979543145{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}"]
  • Water pump & pressure switch – check operation
  • Taps, micro switch, valves, pipes & tank (if fitted) check condition & operation
  • Water filter & housing – check for leaks & replace filter if required
  • Waste system – check for leaks
  • Water tanks (if fitted) – check security of all water tanks, including underslung
  • Drain down – winter only (unless advised by customer not to do so)
  • Toilet – check security, operation of flush pump & lubricate seals
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Ventilation" tab_id="1685977945171-d5fca525-f30cb073-a4b3"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1685979558951{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}"]
  • Fixed ventilation – check for obstruction & free flow of air
  • Check all fixed ventilation is guarded against vermin ingression
  • Roof lights – check for cracks, operation & free of obstructions
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1685977397988{margin-top: 50px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;background-color: rgba(30,115,190,0.14) !important;*background-color: rgb(30,115,190) !important;border-radius: 15px !important;}" _et_uniqid="et_custom_uniqid_new_647df9323bb35"][vc_btn title="Book an Appointment" color="inverse" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Feastanglianservicing.co.uk%2Fbook-appointment%2F|title:Book%20Appointment"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: .vc_custom_1688733883271{margin-top: -20px !important;padding-top: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://eastanglianservicing.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/family-vacation-travel-rv-holiday-trip-motorhome-caravan-car-vacation.jpg?id=8) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}.vc_custom_1685977465927{margin-top: -80px !important;border-top-width: 10px !important;padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-color: #1e73be !important;border-top-style: solid !important;}.vc_custom_1685977397988{margin-top: 50px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;background-color: rgba(30,115,190,0.14) !important;*background-color: rgb(30,115,190) !important;border-radius: 15px !important;}.vc_custom_1685979502375{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}.vc_custom_1685979530240{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}.vc_custom_1685979543145{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}.vc_custom_1685979558951{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}

item.title: Caravan Service
item.dc:creator: finleydesign
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" fixed_background="center_bottom" css=".vc_custom_1687948831184{margin-top: -20px !important;padding-top: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://eastanglianservicing.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/caravan2.jpg?id=79) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}" _et_uniqid="et_custom_uniqid_new_647e08954793b"][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="2/3" css=".vc_custom_1685977465927{margin-top: -80px !important;border-top-width: 10px !important;padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-color: #1e73be !important;border-top-style: solid !important;}" _et_uniqid="et_custom_uniqid_new_647df976b64ca"][vc_custom_heading source="post_title" font_container="tag:h1|font_size:40px|text_align:left|color:%231e73be|line_height:1.2em" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_column_text]A service of all the habitable areas of a caravan or motorhome. In simple terms, this is all of the areas that are sitting on the chassis of the vehicle.[/vc_column_text][vc_tta_accordion c_icon="chevron" active_section="99" no_fill="true" collapsible_all="true"][vc_tta_section title="Electrical System" tab_id="1685977496894-d76e66ed-86bb"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1685979502375{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}"]

  • 12n, 12s/13 pin euro plugs & cables – check condition & test
  • Road lights & reflectors – check condition & operation
  • Battery (if fitted) – check condition of battery and compartment & check battery charge state
  • Battery (if fitted) – check & top up level if required & perform high discharge test
  • Check battery charge rate from 12s/13 pin euro plug
  • Fridge – check operation from 12s/13 pin euro plug
  • Interior lighting & equipment- check operation & fuse rating
  • Awning light – check operation
  • Wiring earths – check for defects on all ELV circuits
  • LV inlet plug & extension lead – check condition & resistance across connection points
  • Earth bonding – carry out resistance check
  • RCD unit – check operation of RCD test button & operation of MCB’s
  • 230v sockets – carry out plug top polarity test
  • Charger – check output charge rate at battery connections
  • Fridge – check operation of fridge on 230v
  • Check operation of all other 230v appliances,fans & luminaries
  • Air conditioning (if fitted) – check operation
  • Check that any additional items are to the correct standard

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Gas System" tab_id="1685977496908-e30ffef1-9659"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1685979530240{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}"]

  • Regulator & gas hose – check age, performance & security
  • Carry out gas leak check
  • Appliances – check operation of all gas appliances fitted including FFDs
  • Gas cylinder – check security
  • Ensure all gas dispersal vents are clear

(Please note the fridge not serviced unless requested)[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Water System" tab_id="1685977944283-4898f6ed-0873"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1685979543145{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}"]

  • Water pump & pressure switch – check operation
  • Taps, micro switch, valves, pipes & tank (if fitted) check condition & operation
  • Water filter & housing – check for leaks & replace filter if required
  • Waste system – check for leaks
  • Water tanks (if fitted) – check security of all water tanks, including underslung
  • Drain down – winter only (unless advised by customer not to do so)
  • Toilet – check security, operation of flush pump & lubricate seals

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Ventilation" tab_id="1685977945171-d5fca525-f30c"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1685979558951{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}"]

  • Fixed ventilation – check for obstruction & free flow of air
  • Check all fixed ventilation is guarded against vermin ingression
  • Roof lights – check for cracks, operation & free of obstructions

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1685977397988{margin-top: 50px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;background-color: rgba(30,115,190,0.14) !important;*background-color: rgb(30,115,190) !important;border-radius: 15px !important;}" _et_uniqid="et_custom_uniqid_new_647df9323bb35"][vc_btn title="Book an Appointment" color="inverse" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Feastanglianservicing.co.uk%2Fbook-appointment%2F|title:Book%20Appointment"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: .vc_custom_1687948831184{margin-top: -20px !important;padding-top: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://eastanglianservicing.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/caravan2.jpg?id=79) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}.vc_custom_1685977465927{margin-top: -80px !important;border-top-width: 10px !important;padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-color: #1e73be !important;border-top-style: solid !important;}.vc_custom_1685977397988{margin-top: 50px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;background-color: rgba(30,115,190,0.14) !important;*background-color: rgb(30,115,190) !important;border-radius: 15px !important;}.vc_custom_1685979502375{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}.vc_custom_1685979530240{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}.vc_custom_1685979543145{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}.vc_custom_1685979558951{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: finleydesign
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Motorhome Repair and Maintenance
item.dc:creator: finleydesign
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" fixed_background="center_bottom" css=".vc_custom_1688733883271{margin-top: -20px !important;padding-top: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://eastanglianservicing.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/family-vacation-travel-rv-holiday-trip-motorhome-caravan-car-vacation.jpg?id=8) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}" _et_uniqid="et_custom_uniqid_new_647e08954793b"][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="2/3" css=".vc_custom_1685977465927{margin-top: -80px !important;border-top-width: 10px !important;padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-color: #1e73be !important;border-top-style: solid !important;}" _et_uniqid="et_custom_uniqid_new_647df976b64ca"][vc_custom_heading source="post_title" font_container="tag:h1|font_size:40px|text_align:left|color:%231e73be|line_height:1.2em" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_column_text]We can fix the problem on your motorhome in all aspects. A faulty toilet or water system, the gas not working on your 3 way fridge or heater system. It could be an electrical fault with a pump or lights or even more vitally a leaky window or damp. We have the experience and knowledge to fix it. Typical motorhome repair includes:
  • Fridge fault on gas or electric
  • Battery charger failure
  • Poor battery condition
  • Gas leaks
  • Window and door hinges
  • Minor damp or water leaks
  • Awning repairs
  • Electrical faults
It is best that we take a look at the issues in advance so that we can accurately diagnose and quote for the motorhome repair.[/vc_column_text][vc_separator][vc_custom_heading text="EICR (Electrical Installation Condition Report)" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:30px|text_align:left|color:%231e73be|line_height:1.2em" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_column_text]In addition to your annual habitation check it is now being recommended by the NCC and AWS that every 3 years your caravan and motorhome has a EICR. A EICR is in in depth report on your vehicles electrical system. Every joint, connection, socket,  cable insulation and plug is checked both electronically with high voltage and manually. This means every connections is checked and tightened as well as inspected for any possible damage or past or potential issues. Some campsites and insurance companies now are asking for this report to ensure safety among caravans and the sites. Insurance companies may even be offering discounts in some instances. Our EICR takes approximately 4 hours and costs: £240 inclusive.  If you would like to read up more please see an independent advice page on what is required, recommended or suggested and when. The AWS leaflet on this recommendation can be viewed here.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1685977397988{margin-top: 50px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;background-color: rgba(30,115,190,0.14) !important;*background-color: rgb(30,115,190) !important;border-radius: 15px !important;}" _et_uniqid="et_custom_uniqid_new_647df9323bb35"][vc_custom_heading source="post_title" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:24px|text_align:left|color:%23686868|line_height:1.2em" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_column_text]Main items include
  • Gas Leak detection
  • Gas appliances safety and operation check
  • 240v Electrical safety and operation check
  • 12v Electrical safety and operation check
  • Fire and safety devices
  • Vehicle inspection and operation survey
  • Full damp check
[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title="Book an Appointment" color="inverse" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Feastanglianservicing.co.uk%2Fbook-appointment%2F|title:Book%20Appointment"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: .vc_custom_1688733883271{margin-top: -20px !important;padding-top: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://eastanglianservicing.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/family-vacation-travel-rv-holiday-trip-motorhome-caravan-car-vacation.jpg?id=8) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}.vc_custom_1685977465927{margin-top: -80px !important;border-top-width: 10px !important;padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-color: #1e73be !important;border-top-style: solid !important;}.vc_custom_1685977397988{margin-top: 50px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;background-color: rgba(30,115,190,0.14) !important;*background-color: rgb(30,115,190) !important;border-radius: 15px !important;}

item.title: WiFi / MiFi and Internet Signal Boosters
item.dc:creator: finleydesign
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" fixed_background="center_bottom" css=".vc_custom_1688994949857{margin-top: -20px !important;padding-top: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://eastanglianservicing.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/man-driving-road-camper-van-rv-caravan-car-vacation-family-vacation-travel-holiday-trip-motorhome-1.jpg?id=81) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}" _et_uniqid="et_custom_uniqid_new_647e08954793b"][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="2/3" css=".vc_custom_1685977465927{margin-top: -80px !important;border-top-width: 10px !important;padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-color: #1e73be !important;border-top-style: solid !important;}" _et_uniqid="et_custom_uniqid_new_647df976b64ca"][vc_custom_heading source="post_title" font_container="tag:h1|font_size:40px|text_align:left|color:%231e73be|line_height:1.2em" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_column_text]Keeping in touch is essential when you’re on the move, but motorhomes and campervans often need a boost when it comes to getting a usable internet connection. Are you finding that … Motorhome and caravan sites may offer free WiFi, but often the signal your vehicle receives is weak and slow? Mobile phone or 4G signals can be poor within your motorhome? Your streaming speeds are too slow, particularly if there are multiple users? 4G Motorhome WiFi / MiFi and internet signal boosters can help improve the situation by boosting and amplifying the signal to your van. Motorhome Workshop offers a complete motorhome and campervan WiFi / MiFi and internet signal boosters fitting service. The high-quality WiFi/MiFi products needed are included as a complete supply and fit package for all types of leisure vehicle. Just explore our products, and ask for a free, no-obligation quote for your vehicle’s make and model by contacting us. Our independently assessed workshop on the South Coast is fully certified under the Approved Workshop Scheme (AWS), so you can have every confidence in the quality of our internet signal booster fitting service.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1685977397988{margin-top: 50px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;background-color: rgba(30,115,190,0.14) !important;*background-color: rgb(30,115,190) !important;border-radius: 15px !important;}" _et_uniqid="et_custom_uniqid_new_647df9323bb35"][vc_custom_heading source="post_title" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:24px|text_align:left|color:%23686868|line_height:1.2em" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_column_text]Main items include
  • Service item
  • Service item
  • Service item
  • Service item
  • Service item
[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title="Book an Appointment" color="inverse" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Feastanglianservicing.co.uk%2Fbook-appointment%2F|title:Book%20Appointment"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: .vc_custom_1688994949857{margin-top: -20px !important;padding-top: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://eastanglianservicing.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/man-driving-road-camper-van-rv-caravan-car-vacation-family-vacation-travel-holiday-trip-motorhome-1.jpg?id=81) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}.vc_custom_1685977465927{margin-top: -80px !important;border-top-width: 10px !important;padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-color: #1e73be !important;border-top-style: solid !important;}.vc_custom_1685977397988{margin-top: 50px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;background-color: rgba(30,115,190,0.14) !important;*background-color: rgb(30,115,190) !important;border-radius: 15px !important;}

item.title: Solar Panel Fitting for Motorhomes, Caravans & Campervans
item.dc:creator: finleydesign
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" fixed_background="center_bottom" css=".vc_custom_1689954629962{margin-top: -20px !important;padding-top: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://eastanglianservicing.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/panels.jpg?id=99) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}" _et_uniqid="et_custom_uniqid_new_647e08954793b"][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="2/3" css=".vc_custom_1685977465927{margin-top: -80px !important;border-top-width: 10px !important;padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-color: #1e73be !important;border-top-style: solid !important;}" _et_uniqid="et_custom_uniqid_new_647df976b64ca"][vc_custom_heading source="post_title" font_container="tag:h1|font_size:40px|text_align:left|color:%231e73be|line_height:1.2em" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_column_text]At East Anglian Servicing, you’ll find a one-stop solution for your off-grid power needs, so you can have motorhome solar panels fitted with confidence and convenience. We offer solar panels on a supply+fitting basis, for all types of motorhomes, campervans and caravans. Our range of 12v kits shown below, all include fully warrantied panels.[/vc_column_text][vc_separator][vc_custom_heading text="EICR (Electrical Installation Condition Report)" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:30px|text_align:left|color:%231e73be|line_height:1.2em" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_column_text]In addition to your annual habitation check it is now being recommended by the NCC and AWS that every 3 years your caravan and motorhome has a EICR. A EICR is in in depth report on your vehicles electrical system. Every joint, connection, socket,  cable insulation and plug is checked both electronically with high voltage and manually. This means every connections is checked and tightened as well as inspected for any possible damage or past or potential issues. Some campsites and insurance companies now are asking for this report to ensure safety among caravans and the sites. Insurance companies may even be offering discounts in some instances. Our EICR takes approximately 4 hours and costs: £240 inclusive.  If you would like to read up more please see an independent advice page on what is required, recommended or suggested and when. The AWS leaflet on this recommendation can be viewed here.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1685977397988{margin-top: 50px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;background-color: rgba(30,115,190,0.14) !important;*background-color: rgb(30,115,190) !important;border-radius: 15px !important;}" _et_uniqid="et_custom_uniqid_new_647df9323bb35"][vc_custom_heading text="Solar Panel Installation" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:24px|text_align:left|color:%23686868|line_height:1.2em" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_column_text]Main items include
  • Service item
  • Service item
  • Service item
  • Service item
  • Service item
  • Service item
[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title="Book an Appointment" color="inverse" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Feastanglianservicing.co.uk%2Fbook-appointment%2F|title:Book%20Appointment"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Motorhome Motor Movers Fitting
item.dc:creator: finleydesign
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" fixed_background="center_bottom" css=".vc_custom_1690279961211{margin-top: -20px !important;padding-top: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://eastanglianservicing.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/motor-movers.jpg?id=105) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}" _et_uniqid="et_custom_uniqid_new_647e08954793b"][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="2/3" css=".vc_custom_1685977465927{margin-top: -80px !important;border-top-width: 10px !important;padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-color: #1e73be !important;border-top-style: solid !important;}" _et_uniqid="et_custom_uniqid_new_647df976b64ca"][vc_custom_heading source="post_title" font_container="tag:h1|font_size:40px|text_align:left|color:%231e73be|line_height:1.2em" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_column_text]Having a fully fitted motor mover can save lots of awkward moments when it comes to the reversing and positioning of your caravan. Powered by the caravans leisure battery, motor movers are fitted to the vehicle chassis. They engage with the vehicle wheels, so your caravan can be manoeuvred forward and backward, or even turned around up to 360 degrees. Our fitted motor mover range includes:
  • Single and twin axel.
  • 4 wheel drive.
Using an approved installer means all installations are carried out in compliance with regulations and wired up to the leisure battery correctly. So you can expect optimum performance, with a motor mover which works efficiently working alongside the rest of your power system.[/vc_column_text][vc_separator][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1685977397988{margin-top: 50px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;background-color: rgba(30,115,190,0.14) !important;*background-color: rgb(30,115,190) !important;border-radius: 15px !important;}" _et_uniqid="et_custom_uniqid_new_647df9323bb35"][vc_custom_heading text="Motor Movers Fitting" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:24px|text_align:left|color:%23686868|line_height:1.2em" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_column_text]Main items include
  • Service item
  • Service item
  • Service item
  • Service item
  • Service item
  • Service item
[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title="Book an Appointment" color="inverse" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Feastanglianservicing.co.uk%2Fbook-appointment%2F|title:Book%20Appointment"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
